title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first point does not require a simplified answer. Substitution of function values is required.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes the criteria below.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The first point is earned with a correct and labeled value of f ′  ( 3 ). MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaceWGMbGbauaacaaMi8+aae WaaeaacaaIZaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaaiOlaaaa@38B4@

The second point can be earned with a consistent tangent line equation created from an incorrect value of f ′  ( 3 ). MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaceWGMbGbauaacaaMi8+aae WaaeaacaaIZaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaaiOlaaaa@38B4@
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes both of the criteria below.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The constant 1 b−a MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWcaaqaaiaaigdaaeaaca WGIbGaeyOeI0Iaamyyaaaaaaa@36B9@ is part of the fourth point.

Simplification is not required for the second point.

The third point is earned with the antiderivative − x 2 2 + 6 π sin( πx 2 ). MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWcaaqaaiabgkHiTiaadI hadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdaaaaakeaacaaIYaaaaiabgUcaRmaalaaa baGaaGOnaaqaaiabec8aWbaaciGGZbGaaiyAaiaac6gadaqadaqaam aalaaabaGaeqiWdaNaamiEaaqaaiaaikdaaaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaGa aiOlaaaa@42E5@ The third point can also be earned with − x 2 2 + 2 π sin( πx 2 ), MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWcaaqaaiabgkHiTiaadI hadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdaaaaakeaacaaIYaaaaiabgUcaRmaalaaa baGaaGOmaaqaaiabec8aWbaaciGGZbGaaiyAaiaac6gadaqadaqaam aalaaabaGaeqiWdaNaamiEaaqaaiaaikdaaaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaGa aiilaaaa@42DF@ though this response will not be eligible for the fourth point.

Simplification is not required for the fourth point.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes two of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes three of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes all four of the criteria below.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first point can be earned by evaluating each branch of the function at x=0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG4bGaeyypa0JaaGimaa aa@35F1@ instead of evaluating the one-sided limits, but the response will not be eligible for the second point.

The second point is earned with correct limit notation for the first point, clear communication that lim x→ 0 − f ( x )= lim x→ 0 + f ( x )=f ( 0 )=3, MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWfqaqaaiGacYgacaGGPb GaaiyBaaWcbaGaamiEaiabgkziUkaaicdadaahaaadbeqaaiabgkHi TaaaaSqabaGccaWGMbGaaGjcVpaabmaabaGaamiEaaGaayjkaiaawM caaiabg2da9maaxababaGaciiBaiaacMgacaGGTbaaleaacaWG4bGa eyOKH4QaaGimamaaCaaameqabaGaey4kaScaaaWcbeaakiaadAgaca aMi8+aaeWaaeaacaWG4baacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaeyypa0JaamOzaiaa yIW7daqadaqaaiaaicdaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGH9aqpcaaIZaGaai ilaaaa@5625@ and a statement that the function is continuous on the closed interval, and therefore must have an absolute maximum. Specifically naming the Extreme Value Theorem is not required to earn this point. Responses that indicate that the function is differentiable on the interval [ −3,  4 ] MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWadaqaaiabgkHiTiaaio dacaGGSaGaaGPaVlaaykW7caaI0aaacaGLBbGaayzxaaaaaa@3B54@ will not earn the point.
